activities: We sell digital goods online. Users create accounts on our website using an email address or through Facebook, Twitter or Steam account logins. This includes (i) collection, storing, analysis, processing, and deletion of personal data, (ii) sending of marketing materials to recipients and administrating promotions, (iii) billing and payment processing, and (iv) order fulfillment.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Email addresses and logins via Facebook, Twitter or Steam are covered. We also log IP addresses via Google Analytics. Include online and offline and manually processed data.
recoursemech: Cooperation with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
